issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Issues setting up Titanium with Android
fields.environment: Windows 10, Titanium CLI v5.1.1, Accelerator v7.0.5, Titanium SDK 7.3.0.GA

comments.body: Hello, Thanks for creating the ticket with details of the issue and the workarounds. I can verify these workarounds. We will make a documentation update regarding this. [~bimmel], Can you make it happen? We need to update the Android SDK configuration wiki on some general issue and possible workarounds. [~hknoechel], Can you confirm? About the third issue any idea when will this be resolved, still, it's in 7.3.0. Thanks.
